# VTIsStereoMVHEVCDecodeSupported()

**Function**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the system supports MV-HEVC decoding.

## Declaration

```swift
func VTIsStereoMVHEVCDecodeSupported() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the system supports MV-HEVC decoding; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Discussion

A return value of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] doesn’t guarantee that decoding resources are available at all times.

## Decoding Multi-Image Frames

- **VTDecompressionMultiImageCapableOutputHandler**: A type alias for callback that the system invokes when it finishes decompressing a frame.
